Because legal gun owners are all responsible adults......emoticon_xclown
 
 "Two neighbours in the US state of Mississippi drew weapons and fired at each other as an argument over a defecating dog ran out of control.
 
 Associated Press news agency said Jerry Blasingame, 60, has been charged with assault for shooting Terry Tehnet, 52, with a shotgun.
 
 Mr Tehnet was angry because he thought Mr Blasingame's dog had defecated on his lawn, in a rural part of the state.
 
 Mr Tehnet, whose injuries are not life-threatening, may also be charged... "
 
 
 BBC News - Defecating dog sparks US shootout

It's a British newspaper reporting on news supposedly happening in America. Find us an American paper or news outlet covering this matter. There's gotta be more to it than just what's presented because I'm not seeing anything saying that they were "legal gun owners". The word "legal" doesn't even appear anywhere in the article you're making a big deal out of.
 
 Keep digging and you'll find some example of at least one of them having a criminal record or connection of some sort.

Even if true, Sinjin said this about a gun running cop.
 
 
If we're going to give up because folks go bad occasionally then where are we?

 
 I think it applies.
